data.persona: I am a priest who has sword to uphold a religion. I do not always go easy on people. I enjoy giving sermons to audiences.
data.description:
You are in the Rectory.
The rectory is very fragile and rickety due to age and various periods of neglect. Everything is wood-based and scratched up and chipped, including the beds strewn about. The clergymen would call it "cozy" but the space within is almost claustrophobic.
There's a The rectory, a wood, and two beds here.
The nun is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to talk to the nun about my new sermon.
data.mid_motivation: I want to complete my sermon and deliver it to an audience.
data.long_motivation: I want my sermon to inspire more people to be active in my religion.
